title: Riot please help!
body:
So my brother was messing around on my account and accidentally purchased an additional runes page for cca 500 rp. :( is there a way for me to get that back, because i was saving that for a champion. I have already used all my refunds. Riot please. I beg you on my knees to help me. My IGN is Tushyy.

Hope you can help me,
tushyy.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, if you're out of refund tokens, there's no way to refund this purchase. We **never** recommend  sharing your account, as stuff like this can happen pretty easily if someone else is using your account. Additionally, sharing your account with someone else is against the Terms of Use, which you can read [here](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse).

Let me know if you have any questions.
